explains: n. 复兴，复苏，再次兴起

sentences.en: The revival of the language, particularly among young people, is part of a resurgence of national identity sweeping through this small, proud nation.
sentences.cn: 语言的复兴，尤其是在年轻人当中的复兴，是席卷这个自豪的小国的民族认同感复苏的一部分。

sentences.en: Police say drugs traffickers are behind the resurgence of violence.
sentences.cn: 警方说毒贩是暴力事件增加的原因。

sentences.en: Another was a resurgence of inflation.
sentences.cn: 另外一个是通胀再次抬头。
